medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports a roughly 48-hour history of abdominal pain that started as crampy discomfort in the periumbilical area/mid-abdomen and has migrated to the right lower quadrant. Pain is described as identical to symptoms experienced on and off for several years, with intermittent episodes lasting several days at a time, sometimes accompanied by fevers. The pain typically onsets in the evening after a meal and worsens by midnight. He denies any changes in bowel habits.
